Dots

Class DotsBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dots.DotsBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DotsBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A wrapper for a 2D array representing the board, with some helper functions Created by JiaHao on 10/2/15.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      private void updateChangedPoints(java.util.ArrayList<DotsPoint> clearedPoints)
      Based on the input dots which are cleared, this method creates and populates an ArrayList of affected dots, namely dots which are cleared and those which are above them, and puts it in the dotsLocks container

    • Method Detail

      • clearDots

        public void clearDots(java.util.ArrayList<DotsPoint> dotsPointList)
        Method to clear and cascade new dots down when an arrayList of points is entered Clearing of dots will trigger an update of the dotsLocks for the dots which need updating
        Parameters:
        dotsPointList - points to be removed from the boardArray. Does not check for validity of move, should have already been in DotsLogic before calling this

      • updateChangedPoints

        private void updateChangedPoints(java.util.ArrayList<DotsPoint> clearedPoints)
        Based on the input dots which are cleared, this method creates and populates an ArrayList of affected dots, namely dots which are cleared and those which are above them, and puts it in the dotsLocks container
        Parameters:
        clearedPoints - points which are cleared from interaction or whatnot
